Package fr.sii.ogham.core.util.bean

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Accessor<T>
    Abstraction for accessing bean property value.
    BeanReadWrapper
    Wraps a bean in order to access its properties.
    BeanReadWrapperFactory
    Factory to create a BeanReadWrapper.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanWrapperUtils
    Some utility methods for bean wrapper management
    DefaultRecursiveBeanReadWrapperFactory
    Implementation that is used by default by RecursiveBeanReadWrapper in order to wrap nested beans.
    DirectAccessor<T>
    The value is already known so provide the value directly.
    FieldAccessor<T>
    Access the property of the bean using reflection.
    MapBeanReadWrapper
    Wraps a bean and exposes as a Map.
    MapBeanReadWrapper.MapBeanReadWrapperEntry
    Specific Entry implementation that delegates to a real bean wrapper in order to access bean properties.
    MapRecursiveBeanReadWrapperFactory  
    ReadMethodAccessor<T>
    Access object property using reflection
    RecursiveBeanReadWrapper
    A wrapper that wraps original bean and all nested property values (only objects, not primitives).
    SimpleBeanReadWrapper
    Simple implementation that wraps a bean in order to access the properties of the bean.
